name: Cheetah
description: The cheetah is an animal of the cat species.

name: Gila monster
description: The Gila monster is one of only a few poisonous lizards in the world.

name: Cobra
description: Venomous snake known for its hood.

name: Lizard
description: Lizards are part of a group of animals known as reptiles.

name: Alligator
description: An alligator, or colloquially gator, is a large reptile in the Crocodilia order in the genus Alligator of the family Alligatoridae.

name: Komodo dragon
description: They are powerful-looking reptiles with wide, flat heads, rounded snouts, bowed legs, and huge, muscular tails.
